pr_title: GEODE-8566: Redis native tests should not also stand up a Geode server

timeline.message: GEODE-8566: Redis native tests should not also stand up a Geode server

timeline.bodyText: Should @Override be added to this method?
timeline.author: sabbey37

timeline.bodyText: This is not related to this PR, but I guess we should go through and make sure these timeouts are all set to Math.toIntExact(GeodeAwaitility.getTimeout().toMillis()); at some point.
timeline.author: sabbey37

replies.bodyText: Good idea - since I'm touching a lot of these files already.
replies.author: jdeppe-pivotal

timeline.bodyText: Should we move this test out of the AbstractRenameIntegrationTest file and into RenameIntegrationTest file like the leakedSubscriptions test (which is just in the SubscriptionsIntegrationTest file)?  Not sure which is better.
timeline.author: sabbey37

replies.bodyText: I decided to just delete the test. I created a story for us to implement RENAMENX.
replies.author: jdeppe-pivotal

timeline.message: Review feedback plus some more tests that did not have native counterparts
